name: Garawobble
description:
Guide your cloudy dude, avoid the enemies and collect tons of coins!

Two game modes (high score and survival), customizable with 5 fancy skins, to be fully enjoyed with three different controller option:
* Joystick: you can move Cloudy with your left thumb, like with a PS5 controller.
* Finger: Cloudy will follow your finger on the screen.
* Tilt: Gravity comes into place! Tilt your device and Cloudy will follow.

Will you be able to set the high score on the leaderboard?


...ah, right, there are fireworks at some point! :D
